Articles.Content:
Wiki human test?

I have no idea how to answer that question on the wiki. When posting an article containing a link, the wiki asks you to answer this question to test if you human or a robot spammer. Thing is, this question has stumped me, and a number of friends and we simply refresh the post until we get asked the monkey question.

How hard is ______ ______, anyway?

What in the world is the answer?

It must be (takes off sunglasses)

An inigma.

AWW YEAAAAAAAAAAAA

(I know it's spelled incorrectly, look at the OP's username)

Orbital Mechanics.

(It's obviously "rocket science", but since others have already answered/will answer with that, I'll do something different.)

Edited July 10, 2013 by AustralianFries

How hard is rocket science anyway.

(It was at the end of their first animation)

It must be (takes off sunglasses)

An inigma.

AWW YEAAAAAAAAAAAA

(I know it's spelled incorrectly, look at the OP's username)

its a shortened version of my wiki name which is longer. its not a mispell of enigma. thanks guys for the answers. i hope i was the only one stumped.
isn't this now random junk aka spam aka trolling aka against the rules? The answer is "rocket science" from kerbal comics.
